parameters.name: AccessToken
parameters.description: Weboffice access token. Obtain it through the [GenerateWebofficeToken](~~478226~~) or [RefreshWebofficeToken](~~478227~~) interfaces.

parameters.name: CredentialConfig
parameters.description:
**If there are no special requirements, leave it blank.**

Chained authorization configuration, optional. For more information, see [Access Other Entity Resources Using Chained Authorization](~~465340~~).

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: Project name. For more information on how to obtain it, see [Create Project](~~478153~~).

parameters.name: RefreshToken
parameters.description: Weboffice refresh token. Obtain it through the [GenerateWebofficeToken](~~478226~~) or [RefreshWebofficeToken](~~478227~~) interfaces.
